Class AProcessMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jpos.util.Log

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public abstract class AProcessMessage
extends org.jpos.util.Log
implements org.jpos.transaction.TransactionParticipant
    Processes Request & Response messages.

    • Method Detail

      • prepare

        public int prepare(long id,
          java.io.Serializable ctx)
        This method is called whenever a new message is received from the remote or from the core. The messages will be contained in the context. This method will delegate to the appropriate method to process a method from the remote or core.
        Specified by:
        prepare in interface org.jpos.transaction.TransactionParticipant
        Parameters:
        id -
        ctx -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        TransactionParticipant.prepare(long, java.io.Serializable)

      • processMsgFromRemote

        public void processMsgFromRemote(org.jpos.iso.ISOMsg msgFromRemote,
                        ContextAction contextAction)
        This method processes any message received from the remote network. It will delegate it to the appropriate handler method based on its message type.
        Parameters:
        msgFromRemote -
        contextAction -
